title: I Can’t Wait!
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>After all is said and done, it won’t be long until the joint event, huh~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>That’s right. I thought we had plenty of time to prepare, but in the end, it got a bit hectic.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ahaha, no kidding~. But the end is in sight now!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Let’s give it our all and finish it up today, shall we?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Okaaay! Aaah~, I’m so pumped for the event. I wonder if our fans are going to enjoy it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>It’s an event jam-packed with things that Chika and the others wanted to do, you know? Of course they’re going to enjoy it. I can’t wait to see the happiness on their faces.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Yeah! I’d love to see them have fun too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Well, festivals are about having fun with everyone, after all.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>I really want them to experience the best time of their lives!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>To do that, we need to be fully prepared first! Alright, You, let’s do this!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
